bug.author: ns1123
bug.summary: Wasteful UFS RPC calls for HDFS
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.x and 1.8.x Describe the bug List on HDFS UFS issues a separate getBlockSizeBytes HDFS call for each file. This is a redundant RPC that can be removed. To Reproduce Mount an HDFS cluster, and open the Alluxio Metrics JSON endpoint. Run a list directory call on the Alluxio directory that has the mounted HDFS and then monitor the UFS metrics for getBlockSizeBytes RPC calls. Expected behavior No increase in getBlockSizeBytes since the available information is already provided via Hadoop API's getStatus. Urgency High Additional context Results in severe latency when bulk listing objects since the getBlockByteSize calls are done serially.
